name: Toothpaste Prescribing
title: Toothpaste prescribing cost per 1000 patients
why_it_matters: OpenPrescribing currently has data on GP prescriptions and does not have information on NHS dentists' prescribing.
Dentists are best placed to assess, prescribe and monitor dental problems, and it is recommended that they should
issue any prescriptions for dental conditions.
recommends that there should be no routine prescribing for the treatment of dental caries. Therefore there should be limited,
if any, prescribing of toothpastes in general practice.
